SCIENCE.ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCES AND ENGINEERING
thesaurusdc.dc:description: GEMET is a thesaurus for the classification of environmental resources that has been developed by the European Environment Agency and the European Topic Centre on Catalogue of Data Sources together with international experts. It contains a core terminology of 5,400 environmental terms (with their definitions) and the terms have been translated into 28 languages.
thesaurusdc.dc:publisher: European Environment Information and Observation Network
